【考法 1】 n. 疲惫： weariness or exhaustion from labor, exertion, or stress
【例】 The day-long battle against the blaze烈火 left firefighters in a state of utter fatigue.
【近】 collapse, exhaustion, lassitude, tiredness, weariness
【反】 refreshment, rejuvenation, revitalization 恢复活力
【考法 2】 n. 苦差事, 让人感到疲倦的： something, such as tiring effort or activity, that causes weariness疲倦
【例】 Although he had joined the army for action and adventure, much of his day seemed to be devoted to mindless fatigues. 尽管当初参军是为了上战场冒险的，但我生活的大部分时间似乎都耗费在了没意思的苦差上
【近】 drudge, drudgery, grind, labor, sweat, toil, travail
【反】 fun, play 玩耍；sinecure 美差，闲职
【记】 fat肥胖 + tigue 音：体格，肥胖的体格容易疲乏，劳累；音：乏体格，疲乏的体格
